_sText:
Surf_torque2

Map made by Sangre Nueva and Nikki
__________________________________

Skill Surf Map based on Torque 1:

- 6 Surf Stages 
- 1 Spawn
- 1 Jail
- 2 Different Time Systems
__________________________________

The System will change every Round
with different Reward for beating it.

System: 1 

- 3 Minutes
- Lvl 4 Disabled
- Jail: M3 and Knife fight with
  pushes in a circle.

System: 2

- 4 Minutes
- Lvl 4 Enabled
- Jail: turns in a combat Jail
  with different guns for each
  level. 
__________________________________

The Map is made for 66 tic and sv_airaccelerate 150.
it includes a M3 Ending, bonus, levelhelper and
secrets aswell.
__________________________________

to install the map u have to put the bsp into
cstrike/maps folder.
__________________________________

Thanks goes to the beta testers:

HellRaisedSurfer, Skar, Pooh- Ah, Balatheshark, Wirelezz

Surf-Velocity.com
www.i3d.net
